story_text: Chip the chick loves to chase butterflies in the cheerful garden.
One day, Chip found a shiny chest hidden behind the cherry tree.
story_images: A small, fluffy chick running with colorful butterflies fluttering around it in a garden full of flowers.
A curious chick peering at a sparkling chest half-buried beneath a lush cherry tree with bright red cherries.

questions.question: What does Chip the chick love to do?
What did Chip find in the garden?
